name: Elecophysioloical Dataset of Patch-seq Recording in non-Human Primate Anterior Insular Cortex
citation: Jing, Junzhan; Liu, Rui-Feng (2026) Elecophysioloical Dataset of Patch-seq Recording in non-Human Primate Anterior Insular Cortex (Version draft) [Data set]. DANDI Archive. https://dandiarchive.org/dandiset/001746/draft
description: The dataset contains the intracellular recordings from Macaque Anterior Insular Cortex neurons.  We used Patch-seq to combine electrophysiology, morphology, and transcriptome of single cells in acute slices. This dataset is electrophysiological data annotated with transcriptomic types (metadata).
studyTarget: We used Patch-seq to combine patch-clamp recording, biocytin staining, and single-cell RNA sequencing of monkey AIC individual neuons.

wasGeneratedBy.name: Cell Atlas and Novel Signal Processing Strategy in Primate Insular Cortex
wasGeneratedBy.description: An investigation of macaque anterior insular cortex

acknowledgement: This work was supported by  Natural Science Foundation of China.
